  • Method Details

    • checkCategory

      public int checkCategory​(int[] roll, int category)
      Method: checkCategory Takes a case to test the roll against, assesses the condition of whether the roll passes the case, and then returns a score of 0 if the roll fails the case, or a value greater than 0. The value greater than zero is computed based on the category's rule.
      Parameters:
      int - [] roll: int array representing a roll.
      int - category: int representing a category to test.
      Returns:
      int score: int with value of corresponding to pass in category, and computed value based on case success.
